title: Stuff Me Like A Turkey: An Erotic Parody
description: What do snails, Doritos, Lord of the Rings, and straws have in common? Obviously they are all great illustrations for hot wild sex! After reading some truly terrible erotica descriptions, including the comparison of a woman's spot to a pot of mac n cheese, I decided to do my best at writing some awful erotica! Follow Mia's adventure for some satisfaction in this horrifically bad erotic short!
author: Alan Austin
